mapper.select: SELECT member_id AS memberId, total_score AS totalScore, rank FROM ( SELECT * FROM member WHERE rank > 0 ORDER BY total_score DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10
mapper.update: UPDATE member a SET rank = ( SELECT rank FROM (SELECT RANK() OVER(ORDER BY total_score DESC) AS rank, member_id FROM member) b WHERE a.member_id = b.member_id ) WHERE total_score > 0
